titleStmt.title: SII 7.785: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 785. (A.R. No. 160 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pukaḻmātu viḷaṅka jayamātu virumpa nilamakaḷ nilava malar
makaḷ puṇara Urimaiyil ciṟan=ta maṇimuṭi cūṭi miṉavar nilaikeṭa villa
var kulaitara Eṉai maṉṉava riḻiyaluṟ ṟiḻitara tikkaṉaittu n=ta ṉ cakkara naṭā
tti virasiṅṅāsaṉattu Ulakuṭaiyāḷoṭum viṟṟirunta
ruḷiya kovirājakecaripaṉmarāṉa tiripuvaṉaccakkaravarttikaḷ śrīkulo
ttuṅkacoḻatevarkku yāṇṭu nāṟpattu Oṉpatāvatu virutarāja
payaṅkaravaḷanāṭṭu meṟkānāṭṭu vāṉavaṉmātevipurattu
nakarattom nilavilai yāvaṇamāka Ivvūr Utavittirumāṇiku
ḻi mahātevar tirumaṭaiviḷākattu śrīkāḻināṭuṭaiyāṉ tiruma
ṭattukku Iṟaiyili maṟa māka tirumāṇikuḻi Āḷuṭaiyar mulapirittiyarā
kiya Āticaṇṭeśvaratevar tirunāmattile nāṅkaḷ viṟṟukkuṭutta nilamāvatu
vañcantampāṭi Erikarai kiḻaimaṭai Uṭaippu veḷḷakkālāṉa māṉakān
taṉukku kiḻakkum vāṉavaṉmātevivatikku kiḻakkum Irājentiracoḻa
vāykkālukku teṟku Aiñcāṅ kaṇṇāṟṟukkum tirumāṇikuḻi Āḷuṭaiyār
tevatāṉattukku teṟkum vañcantampāṭi Erikiḻ kaṭaikoppu neṟikku va
ṭakkum kiḻakku kiriyaḷukku meṟkum Iṉṉāṟpāṟkellaikkum Uḷpaṭṭa nir
nilamum kollainilamum śrīkāḻināṭuṭaiyapiḷḷai tirumaṭattukku Iṟaiyi
māka caṇṭeśvaratevar tirunāmattiley nāṅkaḷ viṟṟukkuṭu
ttu koḷvatāna Emmi licainta vilaipporuḷ Anṟāṭu naṟkācu pattu Ikkācu pa
ttum Innilattukku vilaiyāvutākavum Innilattukku nāṅkaḷey I
ṟai yiṟuttu Iṟaiyili maṭappuṟamāka celuttukaikku nāṅkaḷ koṇṭa kācu Irupatum
Ikkācu Irupatuṅ kaiykkoṇṭa paricāvatu Ivvāṇṭumutal kācu O
ṉṟukku tiṅkaḷ kāl tiramamp palicaiyāka Ikkācu Irupatālum Ittiṅkaḷ Aiñ
cu tiramam palicai polivatākavum Ippaṭi Orāṭṭaikku vanta policai
rupatināl kācu Oṉṟukku tiramam mākak kā raiye mākāṇi
yaraikkāṇiyummey koṇṭu Iṉṉilattukku Iṟaiyiṟuttu Ippecappaṭṭa ṉāṟpāṟ
kellaikku Uḷppaṭṭa ṉilam Immaṭattukku Iṟaiyili celuttakkaṭavomākavum muta
ṟkācū Irupatum Ivvāṇṭumutal cantirātittavarai mutaliṟ citaiyāmal niṟpatākavum Ippa
ṭi celuttummiṭattukokkuṟṟakkuṭik kuṟṟakkāl virotam pukutil virotañ ceytārai
śrīyāññai tiruvāṇai maṟuttāraic ceyvatu ceyitu Ittaṉmattukku virotam vārāmal kāttuc ce
luttakkaṭavomākavum tiruviraiyākkāli maṟuttārai tevaraṭiyārāyuḷḷa Āṇṭārkaḷḷey te
ṇṭittu tiruviraiyākkali nilainiṟuttakkaṭavarkaḷākavum tiruvāṇai maṟuttārai nakarattomey teṇ
ṭittu cantirātittavarai nilainiṟuttakkaṭavomākavum Ippari cicaintu Innilam vilaikkaṟa viṟṟup po
ruḷḷaṟak koṇṭu viṟṟu vilaiyāvaṇañ ceytukuṭuttom Utavittirumāṇikuḻiyāḷḷuṭaiyār mulapṛttiyarākiya
Āticaṇṭeśvaradevaṟkku tirumaṭaiviḷākattu śrīkāḻiṉāṭuṭaiyapiḷḷaiyār tirumaṭattukku Iṟaiyili ma
ṭappuṟamāka caṇṭeśvaratevar tirunāmattāley viṟṟu vilaiyāvaṇañ ceytukuṭuttom vāṉavaṉmā
tevipurattu nakarattom Innilattukku Ituvey vilaiyāvatākavum Ituvey poruḷmāvaṟutip poruṭce
lavolaiyāvatākavum Ituvallatu veṟu poruḷmāvaṟutip poruṭcelavolai kāṭṭakkaṭavatallātitā
kavum Ipparicicaintu vilaikkaṟa viṟṟu poruḷaṟak koṇṭu viṟṟu vilaiyāvaṇañ ceytukuṭuttom śrīkā
ḻināṭuṭaiya piḷḷaiyār tirumaṭattukku caṇṭeśvaratevar tirunāmattey vāṉavaṉmā
tevipurattu nakarattom Ippaṭikku Ivai veḷiyūruṭaiyāṉ viranārāyaṇamuventaveḷān Eḻut
tu Ippaṭikku Ivai vaṭaceriuṭaiyāṉāṉa kulottuṅkacoḻa vecālippāṭimuventave
ḷānneṉ Ivai En Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai kuḷakkuṭaiyāṉ Irājanārāyaṇamu ventaḷonen
Ivai En Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku pullāli vaṭaceriuṭaiyān Araṅkan Uyyavantānnāna vikkiramaṉārāyamuṇa
muventaveḷān Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai kuḷakkuṭaiyāṉ kuṭṭeṟaṉ māyileṭṭiyeṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Itu
kuḷakkuṭaiyāṉ celvaṉ sayijñai Āṉamaikku kuḷakkuṭaiyāṉ celvaṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai kañcāṟaṉ periyān Eḻut
tu Ippaṭikku Ivai nāyaṟukiḻāṉneṉ Ivai En Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai kuḷattūrkiḻavaṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivvūr
vayittiyan pūmā En Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai veḷiyū poreṟṟaneṉ I
vai Eṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Itu veḷiyūru
Digital edition of SII 7.785 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
